nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam / cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyam /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan naś cittam abhāvitam amṛdu bhaviṣyati akarmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam //
(
nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evaṃ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittaṃ / cittaṃ hi bhikṣa

vaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ naḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śi

paśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam / cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ /
tady
uḥ candanaṃ teṣām agram ākhyāyate mṛdutāyāṃ karma

ṇyatāyāṃ /
evam eva nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇ

du bhavati karmaṇyam /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
yac cittaṃ naḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhaviṣyati karmaṇyam evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam // //
) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam adā
m āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam / cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ
yan na naś cittam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhaviṣyati evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
dharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam su
dāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam / cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukha

vipākaṃ bhavati /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
yac cittaṃ naḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
ahitāya hitāya duḥkhāya sukhāya vyasanāya saṃpade vipattaye saṃpattaye asamṛddhaye samṛddhaye apāripūraye pāripūraye
) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitaṃ saṃrāgāya saṃvart
te yathedaṃ cittam / cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ a

bhāvitaṃ saṃrāgāya saṃvartate /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naś cittam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛta
kadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate yathe

subhāvitam asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate /
tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ naḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhā

vitam asaṃrāgāya saṃvartsyati evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
(
gāya asaṃrāgāya evaṃ sadveṣāya asadveṣāya saṃmohāya asaṃmohāya saṃyogāya visaṃyogāy
kleśāya vyavadānāya ācayāya apacayāya upādānāya anupādānāya ucchedāya anucchedāya saṃśre
ṇanāya viśreṇanāya saṃdhūpanāya vidhūpanāya bāhulyāya saṃlekhāya saṃ
sargāya asaṃsargāya prapañcāya niṣprapañcāya ālayāya anālayāya avyupaśamāya vyu
) tadyathā śāliśūko vā yavaśūko vā mithyāduṣpraṇi
āt / taṃ śūkaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī padbhyām anvākrameta / sa tasya abhavyas tva

caṃ bhitvā rudhiram utpādayituṃ / tat kasya hetor / mithyāduṣpraṇihitatvāc chūkasya /
(
mithyāduṣpraṇihitena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā u
ttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsya
vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / tat kasya hetor / mithyāduṣpraṇihitatvāc cittasya /
) tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naḥ citta
ṣpraṇihitaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣit
āliśūko vā yavaśūko vā samyaksupraṇihitaḥ syāt / taṃ śūkaṃ strī vā p
uruṣo vā sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī padbhyām anvākrameta / sa tasya bhavyas tvacaṃ bhitvā rudhiram utpādayituṃ / tat kasya he
ṇihitena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam a
lamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣ

ti vā sthānam etad vidyate / tat kasya hetor / ṛju samyaksupraṇihitatvāc cittasya /
(
tavyaṃ yan naś cittaṃ samyaksupraṇihitaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ
) tadyathā udakapātrī haridrayā vā maṣiṇā vā saṃsṛṣṭā syād āvilīkṛtā / tatra cakṣuṣm
ruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / āv
) evam eva sa bata āvilena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayā
vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā

darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvāc cittasya /
(

śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naḥ cittaṃ mithyāduṣpraṇihitaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //
(
) tadyathā udakapātrī haridrayā vā maṣiṇā vā asaṃsṛṣṭā syād anāvilīkṛtā / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ
ṇaḥ paśyet / tat kasya hetor / a
sa bata anāvilena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadh

i vā sthānam etad vidyate / tat kasya hetor / anāvilatvāc cittasya /
(
) tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac cittaṃ no 'nāvilaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ // //
agninā taptā saṃtaptā kvathitā utsadakajātā syāt / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svakaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvād u
āvilena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ vā jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihā
ratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthā

naṃ vidyate / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvāc cittasya /
(
māt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naś cittam āvilaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bh

jātā syāt / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / anāvilatvād udakapātryāḥ /
(

ttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā sthānam etad vidyate / tat kasya hetor / anāvi
vyaṃ yac cittaṃ no 'nāvilaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ // //

ṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvād udakapātryāḥ /

aparikarmīkṛtaḥ / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhani

mittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / apariśuddhatvād ādarśasya /
(
) evam eva sa bata apariśuddhena cittena aparyavadātena

aparikarmīkṛtena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ vā jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / tat kasya heto
) tasmāt tarhy evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan na naś cittam apariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ //

taḥ suparikarmīkṛtaḥ / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ paśyet / tat kasya hetor / supariśuddhatvād ādarśasya /
(
ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā sthānam e
tad vidyate / tat kasya hetor / supa
yac cittaṃ naḥ supariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati paryavadātaṃ evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ // //
aḥ kalalībhūtaḥ syāt / tatra cakṣuṣmān pu

ṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na paśyet / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvād udakahradasya /
(

ryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / tat kasya hetor / āvilatvāc cittasya /
(
vyaṃ yan na naś cittam āvilaṃ bhaviṣyaty evaṃ vo
) tadyathā udakahradaḥ accho viprasannaḥ anāvilaḥ syāt / tatra cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ svaṃ mukhanimittaṃ pratyavekṣamā
ṇaḥ paśyet / tat kasya hetor / anāvilatvād uda
) evam eva sa bata anāvilena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhiga
maṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā

kṣyati vā sthānam etad vidyate / tat kasya hetor / anāvilatvāc cittasya /
(

durākhyāte dharmavinaya (a) yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ prasavati, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad durākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye (a) yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavati, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ //
khyāte dharmavinaya (b) yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ prasavati, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad durākhyāto dharmavi
nayaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye (b) yaḥ samādāpayati bahuśaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavati, e
vam etad bhavati yathāpi tad svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ //
) durākhyāte dharmavinaya (a) yaḥ samādāpayati (b) yaś ca sam
ādāpyate ubhāv api bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ prasavataḥ, evam eta
d bhavati yathāpi tad durākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye (a) yaḥ samādāpayati (b) yaś ca samādāpyate ubhāv
api bahuśaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavataḥ, evam etad bhavati yathāpi
) durākhyāte dharmavinaya (a) yaś ca samādāpayati (b) yaś ca samādāpyate (c) yaś ca samā
dāpitas tathatāṃ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ pra
savanti, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad durākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye (a) yaś ca samādāpayati (b) yaś ca samādāpyate (c) y
aś ca samādāpitas tathatāṃ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ

aṃ prasavanti, evam etad bhavati yathāpi tad svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ //
(
dharmavinaye yathāyathā ārabdhavīryas tathātathā pāpaṃ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathā
durākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathātathā śreyaḥ / svākhyāte dhar
) yathā pāpaṃ śreya evaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ, na sparśaṃ sparśo duḥkha ///
ryas tathātathā anarthaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathātathā anarthaḥ / durākhyāte dharmavinaye yathā
yathā kusīdas tathātathā arthaḥ / svākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāya
) ahitaṃ hitaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vyasanaṃ saṃpad vipattiḥ
saṃpattiḥ asamṛddhiḥ samṛddhiḥ apāripūriḥ pāripūriḥ parihāṇih aparihāṇi
) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi ya evam anarthāya saṃvartate yathā durākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ / durā
khyāto dharmavinayaḥ anarthāya saṃvartate / nāham ekadharmam api
samanupaśyāmi ya evam arthāya saṃvartate yathā svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ / svākhyāto dharmavinayaḥ arthāya
) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yena samanvāgato bālo mūḍha avyakta asatpuruṣo veditavyaḥ yathā durākhyāt
dharmavinayena samanvāgato bālo mūḍha avyakto asatpuruṣo veditavyaḥ //
) nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yena samanvāgato paṇḍito vyaktaḥ satpuruṣo v

thā svākhyātena dharmavinayena / svākhyātena dharmavinayena samanvāgato paṇḍito vyaktaḥ satpuruṣo veditavyaḥ / bālaḥ kṣato bhalla upapadyate pūrvavat // // pūrvavat = apāyadurgativinipāteṣu gacchati patati upapadyate dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati: s.  15.61

saṃyojanais tathā /
  satvasaṃśabditā aṣṭau pudgalair api cāṣṭikā //
) (a) ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā
sarve te avidyānivaraṇena / (b) avidyānivaraṇaṃ teṣām agram ākhyātaṃ yaduta saṃgrahāya //
) (a) ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sarve te avidyānivaraṇena / (b) a
dyānivaraṇaṃ teṣām agram ākhyātaṃ yaduta saṃgrahāya / (c) avidyānivaraṇe samavahate evaṃ teṣāṃ samudghāto bhavati //
) (a) ye kecid anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃ

sarve te avidyānivaraṇena / (b) avidyānivaraṇaṃ teṣām agram ākhyātaṃ yaduta saṃgrahāya /
(
